main.name: Amit Kumar
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.about: I am a Full-Stack developer based in Chandigarh, India. I'm passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites and applications, and I'm constantly pushing myself to learn and grow as a developer. Love building full-stack clones and side projects. A results-driven software development professional with strong expertise in web development, specializing in front-end development and proficient in programming languages such as JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Skilled in agile methodologies, collaboration, and delivering user-centric solutions that adhere to quality assurance standards. Adept at debugging, optimizing performance, and integrating RESTful APIs. Passionate about leveraging analytical skills and problem-solving abilities to contribute to organizational success and maintain reliable software systems.

desc: Worked on web application development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designing a database system using SQL and MongoDB
Familiar with software development methodologies and project management practices, including Agile and Waterfall methodologies.

My proficiency in React.js extends beyond front-end development. I have a strong command of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, allowing me to seamlessly integrate these technologies to deliver polished and fully functional web applications.

Additionally, I am experienced in working with state management libraries like Redux and have a solid foundation in modern front-end tools and frameworks. Throughout my freelance journey, I have demonstrated a keen eye for detail, ensuring clean and maintainable code that adheres to industry best practices.
I am skilled in implementing responsive designs, optimizing performance, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility to deliver seamless experiences across different platforms.
Optimized application performance, reducing load times and enhancing reliability.
Collaborated with backend teams to integrate RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless communication between systems.
Wrote clean, maintainable code while implementing object-oriented programming concepts.
Worked closely with the QA team to conduct compreshensive testing, ensuring the application meet high quality standards.
Assisted in strategic planning and deployment of new features, demonstrating adaptability to changing priorities.
Spearhead front-end development for government projects, ensuring adherence to SDLC and delivering high-quality outputs.
Develop scalable solutions using React 18, Material-UI, and Redux Toolkit while integrating back-end development inputs with Java and PostgreSQL.
Manage API integrations, bug fixes, and code optimization to ensure reliable and robust systems.
Participate in daily standups, prepare technical documentation , and maintain version control using GitHub.
Contribute to teamwork through effective communication, analytical skills, and collaboration with cross-functional teams.
